Aubameyang Jadi Kapten Baru Arsenal? Begini Jawaban Unai Emery
03 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery melontarkan sinyal positif tentang kemungkinan Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang jadi kapten baru Arsenal. Dia mengakui Auba punya modal berharga untuk memimpin tim.
Stiker andalan The Gunners ini terlihat mengenakan ban kapten ketika Arsenal bermain imbang 1-1 dengan Wolverhampton Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB. Aubemeyang pun mencetak satu-satunya gol Arsenal pada pertandingan tersebut.
Keputusan Emery menyerahkan ban kapten pada Auba bukan kebetulan. Seharusnya Granit Xhaka yang jadi kapten Arsenal, tapi dia terlibat konfrontasi dengan publik Emirates Stadium saat The Gunners bermain imbang 2-2 dengan Crystal Palace pekan lalu.
Insiden tersebut bahkan melahirkan rumor pencopotan ban kapten Xhaka. Sebab itu, keputusan Emery memilih Aubameyang ini bisa jadi petunjuk. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!

Aubameyang Become Arsenal's New Captain? Here's Unai Emery's answer
Nov 3 2019, 13:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery gave a positive signal about the possibility of Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang becoming Arsenal's new captain. He admitted Auba had valuable capital to lead the team.
The Gunners mainstay sticker is seen wearing the armband when Arsenal drew 1-1 with Wolverhampton Saturday (11/02/2019) night WIB. Aubemeyang also scored the only Arsenal goal of the match.
Emery's decision to hand over the armband to Auba was no accident. Granit Xhaka should have been captain of Arsenal, but he was involved in a confrontation with the public at the Emirates Stadium when the Gunners drew 2-2 with Crystal Palace last week.
The incident even gave birth to rumors of removal of Xhaka's armband. Therefore, Emery's decision to choose Aubameyang could be a clue. Read below, Bolaneters!
